Suatu hari, dia bertemu dengan seorang lelaki bernama Eki yang anehnya mempunyai fobia terhadap buah mangga. Namun begitu, lelaki itu bertegas ingin membeli mangga dan meminta Ziya memilihkan buah tersebut untuknya.

programme.title: Mega Series Suara Hati Istri: Anjani Ep19
programme.desc: Anjani berkahwin dengan Ammar melalui perkahwinan yang diatur, namun malangnya Ammar tidak mencintai Anjani, terutamanya selepas mengetahui bahawa Anjani sukar untuk hamil. Akhirnya, Anjani mengambil anak angkat yang ternyata mempunyai rahsia masa lalu dalam kehidupan suaminya.

programme.title: Spiritwalker
programme.desc: A man loses memory and wakes up in a new body every 12 hours. In search of his identity, he met a woman who claims to know him.

programme.title: On The Line
programme.desc: Voice phishing victim infiltrates into the organisation's call center to recover the money, yet discovered another large scale scam ahead...

programme.title: Be With You
programme.desc: Before her death, a woman promises her family that she would return on a rainy day, one year later. Miraculously, she reappears before her husband and son but has no memory about her past.

programme.title: Veteran
programme.desc: A merciless detective hunts down a young and successful drug addict who always escapes from investigations with the help of his wealth and connections.

programme.title: Return Of The Mafia
programme.desc: 10 years ago, the mafia family welcomed the entrepreneur Dae-suh as the son-in-law. They set up a company and Dae-Suh becomes the president. The family plot a conspiracy against him...

programme.title: Door Lock
programme.desc: A woman, living by herself, finds her door lock cover left open one day. Startled by this, she starts investigating on her own and finds more hints of someone trying to enter her home.

programme.title: The Devil'S Deal
programme.desc: A national assembly candidate, a hidden politics powerhouse and a gangster rivals for a top secret document that will shake the nation's core.

programme.title: Noryang: Deadly Sea
programme.desc: Based on the historical Battle of Noryang in 1598. A story of Yi Sun-Shin's last battle during the Japanese invasions of Korea.

programme.title: Secret Zoo
programme.desc: Dreams of landing a permanent position at a top law firm, a lawyer takes on an unusual assignment of keeping an ownerless zoo running by convincing its employees to dress up as animals.

programme.title: Honest Candidate 2
programme.desc: Joo Sang-sook, who failed to win the Seoul mayoral election by dropping the truth bomb on national television, is suddenly pulled into the spotlight again after rescuing a young man from drowning.

programme.title: Code Name: Jackal
programme.desc: Serial killer Jackal is said to appear at a hotel where K-pop star Choi Hyun is staying. Min-Jung is a hitman hired to kill Choi. Curious chemistry develops between Choi and Min-Jung.

programme.title: Life Is Beautiful
programme.desc: Se-yeon, devoted her entire life to her family, suddenly learns she is gravely ill. Now she is determined to live for herself more than ever and looks for her first love with the help of her husband.

programme.title: Fist & Furious
programme.desc: A former detective grants permission to a freelance video journalist to cover his revenge journey on a mob boss whom previously killed his partner during an investigation.

programme.title: Once In A Summer
programme.desc: A young couple in 1969 meet and fall in love in the midst of economic and political changes and get swept up and torn apart by the political tensions of the time.

programme.title: Door Lock
programme.desc: A woman, living by herself, finds her door lock cover left open one day. Startled by this, she starts investigating on her own and finds more hints of someone trying to enter her home.

programme.title: A Melody To Remember
programme.desc: Amidst the Korean War in 1952, Lt. Han Sang-Ryul formed a choir with the orphaned refugee children in Busan, finding solace and purpose through music, despite the hardships of war.

programme.title: Hot Young Bloods
programme.desc: In a rural town in 1982, a tough young girl secretly has a crush on a playboy. When a transfer student arrives, the playboy falls in love with her causing unexpected chaos at school.

programme.title: Pilot
programme.desc: Han Jung-woo is a popular star pilot. He is unable to work in any company due to a momentary mistake. He later gets a job his sister's identity. But his new job is soon threatened...

programme.title: Swing Kids
programme.desc: The story of a North Korean soldier who joined the tap dancing team "Swing Kids" in the Geoje prison camp during the Korean War.

programme.title: Voice Of A Murderer
programme.desc: The only son of a news anchor disappears without a trace. There is a veteran cop and his special task force assigned to this case, but there is an indication the kidnapper is aware of their presence.

programme.title: Miss Fortune
programme.desc: Swindler Ji-Hye is looking to make her last big score. Together with her daughter, they infiltrate the house of a cultural property broker with a net worth of 60 billion won.

programme.title: Be With You
programme.desc: Before her death, a woman promises her family that she would return on a rainy day, one year later. Miraculously, she reappears before her husband and son but has no memory about her past.

programme.title: Rolling
programme.desc: Juri with depression is stuck at home during COVID. As her mother went visit Juri's grandmother, Juri has to run their Kimbap restaurant until her mother returns.

programme.title: Noryang: Deadly Sea

They all raised audiences interest by introducing unexpected changes to the way music that performed.

programme.title: Bond of Friendship Ep6
programme.desc: The documentary series consists of six chapters that represent China's history of openness through the Canton Fair.

programme.title: Talk To Your Boss: Hiring Season Ep7
programme.desc: This season introduces a new talent recruitment strategy called "Waiting for Talent, Eager for Ability," which focuses on the relationships between job seekers and employers. It not only highlights the importance of corporations recruiting talent but also shares the untold stories of the workplace.

programme.title: The Foodie Journey Season 2 Ep34

programme.title: Super Mom Ep1

programme.title: Go! The Little Knights Ep9
programme.desc: A parenting adventure reality show features six parent-child families on a challenging and exciting cycling journey in Ningxia. Hu Jun, the founder of the Little Knights Training Camp, works closely with the little knights to overcome challenges and difficulties, joined by guests Richie Jen, Li Chen, Kelly Yu, Philip Wu, Tu Songyan, and Jason Fu. They observe the children's growth throughout their cycling journey.

programme.title: Study On The Island Season 3 Ep8
programme.desc: The third season invites writers, translators, publishers, and readers from various nations to participate, fostering a literary dialogue between Eastern and Western civilizations on the Crete island in Greece.

programme.title: Melody Journey (Repackaged) Ep12
programme.desc: This is the first original music performance program, which has invited singers such as Joker Xue, Jane Zhang, Zhou Shen, Shan Yichun, and Lars Huang. In addition to numerous emerging original music artists, it has also attracted veteran musicians such as Xiao Ke, Vincent Fang, and Huang Kuo-lun. The program consists of two core segments: a debut stage and a competition for an original song. This singer-songwriter interaction provides them a cooperative platform to produce a brand-new highlight for the Mandarin music scene.

programme.title: Travel With The Royal Family Ep4
programme.desc: Reunited for the first time in thirteen years were Ada Choi, Tao Xin-ran, Xi Lan, Zhang Xiao-long, Lan Ying-ying, Chen Si-si, and Yang Jiu-lang. Beginning from Daguanyuan in Beijing, the filming location of the top-leading drama "Empresses in the Palace", they traveled to various ethnic cultural origins. Through in-depth exploration and study, they experienced the local customs and culture, carrying with them both nostalgic memories and new aspirations, completing their "Rejuvenation Journey" across China.

programme.title: 100 Wife T Ep220
programme.desc: Three generations of the Jin family live under one roof. Mrs. JinKe meiman has two sons, YouTsai and YouDe. YouTsai abandoned the family many years ago, leaving his wife SiouYing to shoulder the huge responsibility of the Jin family business selling fish products at market. Although SiouYing was betrayed by YouTsai, she has still been a dutiful daughter to her motherinlaw, and has singlemindedly raised four children.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan T Ep3778

programme.title: Top Singers T Ep652
programme.desc: The show Top Singers aims to spotlight outstanding Taiwanese singers and composers, setting a new standard in the industry. Combining elements of competition, variety, and personal stories, the show welcomes participants of all ages. Its goals include discovering grassroots talent, innovating Taiwanese song performance styles, and involving more local talent in song composition to infuse new life into Taiwanese music.

programme.title: Show Biz M Ep1006
programme.desc: Every second counts in Show Biz to bring you with the most High Speed star news, exciting live shows and performers interviews.

programme.title: Dear Mom M Ep38
programme.desc: FengYi Li handles everything in the house while her husband, ShuAn, lounges and daydreams. She constantly worries about the love lives of their four daughters. YiWan starts a relationship with a gang leaders son despite claiming to have never dated. QingQing may be having an affair with a married man. XiaoXi is infatuated with the school team captain but is unaware of the others. AnQing returns from the US with her son after a failed marriage. When FengYi suddenly disappears, the sisters realize theyve neglected their mother, who has always supported them. Now they must find her and get their lives back on track.

programme.desc: Brand new concept of a travelogue show! Hosts will be using a different perspectives and knowledge to show you the latest tourist spots to check in! PK

programme.title: Show Biz M Ep1006
programme.desc: Every second counts in Show Biz to bring you with the most High Speed star news, exciting live shows and performers interviews.

programme.title: Show Biz M Ep1007
programme.desc: Every second counts in Show Biz to bring you with the most High Speed star news, exciting live shows and performers interviews.

programme.title: The Borderless World M Ep757
programme.desc: Journalist with an infallible nose for a story is leading the audience to explore the world. Exploring how people from different cultures overcome the challenges with collective wisdom.

programme.title: Mr.Player M Ep531
programme.desc: Depending on the locations of the missions, Jacky Wu, the leader of the home team, invites various celebrities to take on challenges and bring you excitement every week.

programme.title: Gung Hay Fat Choy M Ep34
programme.desc: In a bad economy, many people dream of becoming rich overnight, especially the Jiang family. Mother Jiang pushes her three children to earn money so that they can one day live in luxury. Even her daughterinlaw wishes for the same thing. She hopes that one day she can visit her parents with the money that spills out of her purse.

programme.title: American Girl
programme.desc: 13 year-old Fen is uprooted from LA and moves to Taipei in early 2003, when her mother is diagnosed with breast cancer. She struggles to adjust to her new life with a new school and long-separated father, and drifts away from her mother. When her younger sister is misdiagnosed with SARS, they finally open up to each other during quarantine.

programme.title: New Kung Fu Cult Master 1
programme.desc: Wu Dang Sects Zhang Chui Shans son, Zhang Wu Ji, finds himself accidentally embroiled in the fight for the Dragon Sabre. When he unwittingly learns the powerful martial arts skills from the Jiuyin scriptures, Wu Ji proceeds to help the Six Major sects fight against the corrupt government.

programme.title: Secret Diary of a Mom To Be, The
programme.desc: A high-flying PR manager and her loving husband swear by a childless lifestyle but she is shocked to learn that she is expecting just when things look bright for a promotion! How would they deal with the unexpected surprises that life throws in their way?

programme.title: Infernal Affairs III
programme.desc: Ming is transferred to do menial police work ten months after the murder of Yan, in 2004. Meanwhile, a new star, Wing, has emerged in the police force and Ming suspects he is also a mole sent by the triad. Determined to start anew, Ming must kill Wing while ensuring his own identity does not get exposed.

programme.title: Princess and 7 Kung Fu Masters
programme.desc: Seven Kung Fu masters live in Lucky Town, the only safe residing place in northeast China. When warlord Lam refuses to side with the Japanese, an agent is assigned to take over his army and kill his daughter using ninjutsu. Lams daughter escapes and seeks help from the seven masters, who finally defeat the enemy and save the warlord!

programme.title: One More Chance
programme.desc: Chow Yun Fat stars as a down-on-his-luck gambler, Water, whose ex-girlfriend asked him to take care of their autistic son. As Water lives with his son, he soon finds his goal in life. When he discovers his sons talent in running, Water decides to give up his dissipated life and support his son to achieve his dream.

programme.title: Endless Battle
programme.desc: This is a story about two brothers. The younger brother is a drug lord while the elder brother Zhong is a police officer in the Narcotics Bureau. Both are involved in a drug cartels turf battle and during an escort mission, Zhong discovers his brothers hidden identity. This leads to an endless battle between good and evil.

programme.title: Kung Fu Dunk
programme.desc: Shi Jie grew up in a martial arts school and possesses an extraordinary shooting skill. Street hustler Chen Li sees his talent and arranges for him to join a university basketball team. With his kung fu dunking skill, Shi Jie manages to win all college basketball matches, bringing him wealth and also strengthening his relationship with Chen Li.

programme.title: Z Storm
programme.desc: ICAC Chief Officer Luk is on the case of a corrupt policeman but finds all key witnesses killed when he starts to discover some clues. As investigation continues, Luk uncovers the fraud scheme of an organized corrupt group involving the governments $15 billion Care Fund. He must fight against them to keep Hong Kong corruption free.

programme.title: The Phantom Lover
programme.desc: In 1926 China, Sung, a talented singer, is deeply in love with To, a sweet innocent girl from a wealthy family. Their love evokes strong disapproval from To's father and bitter jealousy from her designated fianc, a young man chosen by her family. This is a story about a singer and a wealthy girl battling to be together in a traditional community.

programme.title: One and Only
programme.desc: Veteran street dancer Ding Lei, invites passionate street dancer, Chen Shuo to his dance club. Sparks fly when Chen dances with the clubs top dancers. Chen pursues his dream to perform but discovers that Ding has invited him for another reason. As both of them deal with hard times, can they turn the tide on the challenges that they are facing?

programme.title: Lonely Eighteen
programme.desc: Set in the 1980s Hong Kong, Elaine and her best friend Ying enter the entertainment industry hoping to change their fates from poverty. Ying soon becomes a popular porn star but Elaine is lost between being her true self and an actress. When show business declines after a decade, their choices lead them to two different paths in life.

programme.title: Enter the Fat Dragon
programme.desc: Donnie Yen plays a Hong Kong police officer who is highly skilled in martial arts but balloons to more than 200 pounds after his fianc left him. His boss can only assign simple tasks to him like escorting a criminal to Japan, but can he complete it?

programme.title: Mr & Mrs Gambler
programme.desc: Manfred and Flora are gambling addicts who have come across each other a few times at the casino, but do not leave impression on each other until they both suffer heavy losses and are held hostage by the loan sharks in Macau. They find themselves falling in love, and decide to get married when they come back to Hong Kong.

programme.title: Mr. Long
programme.desc: A Taiwanese hitman Mr. Long escapes from the triad after his assignment in Tokyo gone awry. He encounters a Taiwanese woman and her son and the three of them start a new life together. Unfortunately, Mr. Long is being pursued by the triad again

programme.title: Hidden Heroine
programme.desc: A drug cartel is entrenched in the Dong Zhou area. Mei Jing of the Thunderbolt Womens Commando Unit, leads her team to attack the drug base, but they are being ambushed and the identity of Meis father as an undercover is exposed. After a fierce battle, Mei and her team manage to successfully defeat the drug cartel and rescue her father.

programme.title: Endgame
programme.desc: A killer and a stage actor accidentally swapped their identities at a bathhouse. The actor must complete the killers mission while the killer thinks he is a hopeless actor after losing his memory during the accident. When the killer strives to become a successful stage actor, he also starts to recall what has happened

programme.title: A Witness out of the Blue
programme.desc: The police suspects that a jewel thief, found dead in his unit with all stolen goods missing, is killed by his gang leader. They also found the crime to be related to a jewel robbery many months ago, with the robbers involved being killed off one by one. In this complicated case, the polices only witness is a talking parrot from the crime scene.

programme.title: The Ex-Files 4: Marriage Plan
programme.desc: Two brothers, Meng Yun and Yu Fei, are of marriageable age and are facing challenges in love. Yun dodges family pressure to marry after his breakup, while Fei and his girlfriend opt for a marriage cooling-off period to tackle marriage issues.

programme.title: Hand Rolled Cigarette
programme.desc: A retired British-Chinese soldier becomes a target in a triad manhunt when he takes in a young South Asian man who carries a bag of stolen drugs. Forced to live together, the two men transcend conflicts and cultural differences to form a beautiful friendship in this poignant tale of loyalty and brotherhood.

programme.title: Old Fox
programme.desc: In 1989, young Liao Jie and his father save for a home, unaware of rising property prices. Frustrated by poverty, he learns from their landlord Old Fox who teaches him survival in society. Liao Jie ends up hurting Old Fox with what he has learnt, but his empathy prevents him from becoming like Old Fox.

programme.title: The Calling of a Bus Driver
programme.desc: A girl named Suki fulfills her dream of being a bus driver after breaking up with her boyfriend, who has an affair with her good friend. When Suki is invited to attend her ex-boyfriends wedding, she is presented with a chance for revenge will she take it and turn her life around?

programme.title: Knockout
programme.desc: A former boxing champion and convict who has just been released from prison discovers that his wife has died and he is now a single parent. The situation is made worse with his daughters diagnosis of leukaemia. In order to encourage his daughter and fulfil his promise of never giving up, he re-enters the boxing ring.

programme.title: City Under Siege
programme.desc: When circus clown Sunny gets transformed into a super-powered mutant, he finds himself pitted against his fellow circus performers who were altered in the same accident, and who are now using their powers to wreak havoc around the city.

programme.title: The Way We Keep Dancing
programme.desc: This sequel of The Way We Dance features the plight of Hong Kongs grassroots performing artists as they fight against the governments plan to gentrify an industrial district where they settled in.

programme.title: Shadows
programme.desc: Ching is a forensic psychiatrist who has the power to enter a persons subconscious mind. In her latest case, she suspects that another psychiatrist is responsible for a brutal murder-cum-suicide case involving a social worker. In the investigation process, Ching finds herself under suspicion instead, as she comes face-to-face with a past trauma

programme.title: Flirting Scholar 2
programme.desc: The movie tells the story of Tang Bo Hu and his three buddies before they become the four great talents in Jiangnan. Tang Bo Hu encounters a beautiful girl when studying in a monastery and they quickly fall in love, but her hidden identity is accidentally unveiled when Tang and friends uncover a conspiracy at the monastery.

programme.title: Dust to Dust
programme.desc: Back in 1995, the Police successfully arrested five armed bank robbers while the two masterminds got tipped off and made a clean escape. Decades later, retired cop Wang Shou Yue is drawn back to the unsolved case when he sees a blurred figure in a news clip. A battle between good and evil has just begun!

programme.title: Beauty And The 7 Beasts
programme.desc: Teddy, once a renowned movie star, is facing a career decline. To make a living, he accepts five disciples to shape them into stars. Teddys career regains momentum after he reunites with his long-lost daughter, but he is also confronted by a rival at the same time. His daughter and disciples decide to help him overcome this difficult situation

programme.title: Bodyguards and Assassins
programme.desc: On 15 October 1906, Chinese revolutionary leader Sun Yat Sen returned to Hong Kong to stage another overthrow of the Qing dynasty. Businessman Lee and Chinese Dailys Chief Chan arrange for five bodyguards to protect Mr Sun - these are all extraordinary fighters who are ready and up for fierce battles against the Qing assassination army.

programme.title: Kung Fu Mahjong 3
programme.desc: Gambling tycoon Man suddenly marries his new partner Sophie, which shocked his only son, Ken. In the wake of Man's heart attack, Ken must battle Sophie - who has persuaded Man to transfer his grand master title to her in the event of his death - for the rightful claim to the familys gambling business in a riveting game of mahjong.

programme.title: Mama's Affair
programme.desc: Former talent manager Mei Fung stays home to take care of her husband and son after retirement. She decides to re-enter the entertainment business to find her value in life, and successfully transforms a local restaurant delivery boy, Fong Ching, into a young pop idol. This makes her teenage son, Jonathan, intensely jealous of Fong Ching.

programme.title: The Fastest Sword
programme.desc: Southern Swordsman Ting is named The Fastest Sword but is defeated by a street monk and has to fulfil his promise of working on stone craving with the monk for three years. Ting returns home to lead a peaceful life after that and declines all fight challenges. Even so, he is forced to fight the Northern Swordsman. Who will win finally?

programme.title: Return of the Phoenix
programme.desc: An imperial minister Cheng betroths his pretty younger daughter, Ye, to his friend's son, Mu. His wife however, refuses to let Ye marry before her elder daughter Yan, who is ugly and undesirable. Yan is asked to pretend as Ye to meet Mu but scares him away. A rich guy who likes Ye meanwhile pretends as Mu to attend the wedding...

programme.title: A Deadly Secret
programme.desc: A corrupt magistrate, obsessed with finding a hidden treasure, jails and tortures his daughter's lover and buries his daughter alive! Ironically, it is in her coffin that the secret to the hidden treasure is found, setting off a frenzy of destruction.

programme.title: The Magnificent Trio
programme.desc: A group of farmers who are being oppressed by the local magistrates kidnap one of the magistrates daughter in the hope of being heard by the authorities. A wandering swordsman offers his help and aiding him are two fighters who have both switched sides from being the oppressors to the oppressed. The trio fight back against the magistrates!

programme.title: Disciples of the 36th Chamber
programme.desc: In the finale of this trilogy, Gordon Liu reprises his famous role, Monk San Te, as he tries to protect Fang Shih Yu, an arrogant youth who gets into trouble with the Qing officials, and nearly lands Shaolin Temple into trouble too.

programme.title: Emperor Chien Lung and the Beauty
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung meets a famous courtesan in Suzhou and in order to spend as much time as possible with her, he builds a direct underground tunnel into the Forbidden City. The emperors sudden appearances through this direct access shock his people but it is also at this time that he helps the needy and cracks the gambling business in Suzhou.

programme.title: Reincarnated Swordsman
programme.desc: A Wu Dang disciple Fu, kills the chief of Wu Dang Clan and frames it on the chiefs illegitimate child, Yun. Fu then proclaims himself the new chief and orders the killing of Yun, who vows to avenge his fathers death and learns the invincible silkworm martial arts style in order to defeat Fu.

programme.title: The Lotus Lamp
programme.desc: Linda Lin Dai plays both mother and son in this lavish fable about a goddess who falls in love with a mortal scholar (Cheng Pei-pei in her debut role). Over two years in production, it was released on the first anniversary of Linda's tragic suicide.

programme.title: The New One-Armed Swordsman
programme.desc: David Chiang plays the all-new one-armed hero - a man who chops off his right arm rather than live with dishonor. When the love of his life is kidnapped and his best friend is murdered by the evil gang, it is time to battle.

programme.title: Hex after Hex
programme.desc: Hell may have no fury like a woman scorned, but hell literally, really has no wrath like a lusting ghost scorned! Cult classic director Kuei Chih-hung shoots the works with this amazing horror romance starring muscular "Venom" Lo Meng.

programme.title: The Warlord
programme.desc: A bandit became a warlord in northern China by helping Russia fight against Japan. Due to his ignorance and silly behaviour, he is seen as a joke to everyone. The warlord is finally killed by the daughter of a troupe master whom he had killed for no reason, bringing a befitting end to a traitor.

programme.title: The Snake Prince
programme.desc: The Snake Prince lives on the Snake Mountain of Kwangsi with other snakes and they have lived peacefully with humans for a thousand years. All things change however, when the Snake Prince falls in love with one of the three beauties performing a sensual rain dance in the nearby village one day, and decides to marry her at all costs...

programme.title: The Enchantress
programme.desc: Shot on the Shaws' lot in the final years of Hong Kong's greatest studio, The Enchantress tells the story of martial artists who disappear in the night! Intrigued, wanna-be detective/swordsman Feng Chi-wu (Mok Siu-chung) is determined to find out what is happening. But when Feng finds out that an evil vampire spirit (Wei Chiu-hua) is killing swordsmen, he's in for more than he bargains for... It's an outlandish fairy-tale and martial arts fantasy, where your fists and sword aren't nearly enough!

programme.title: West Chamber
programme.desc: The story is based on a famous Chinese opera. A young impoverished scholar, Zhang, is enchanted by Hong, the daughter of an influential family whom he meets in a temple. The young couple faces the threat of separation due to her familys objection, so Hongs maid secretly helps to arrange their rendezvous in the West Chamber!

programme.title: Death Duel
programme.desc: Third Master is a renowned swordsman in the martial arts world, but the constant challenges by other swordsmen compel him to fake his death and pursue a secluded life. This does not prevent others from seeking him out to challenge him however, and he is forced to return to fight his way till the end.

programme.title: Summer Heat
programme.desc: Aptly described by its original title of "Money, Sex And Love", this is a gripping drama about Judy, a woman with a rich husband as well as two lovers who happen to be brothers. Jenny Hu is Judy, and her knockout beauty makes this summer sizzle...

programme.title: Usurpers Of Emperor's Power
programme.desc: The last ruler of Tang, Li Yao is deposed by Chao Kuang-jun, the founder of the Sung Dynasty. Unfortunately his actions unleash a new plague - his brother Kuang-yi - on the courts and his people. The marauding Kuang-yi rapes and plunders. As more people get involved, it turns into a bloody battlefield of betrayal. It is up to upright officials like Li Lang to put an end to it. But can one man take on the imperial army?

programme.title: Two Champions of Shaolin
programme.desc: Set in the Qing Dynasty, the Shaolin clan wants to overthrow Qing and restore the Ming Dynasty, while the Wudang clan is backed by the Qing government. The two renowned clans eventually set themselves up against each other, and a series of vicious fighting has just begun

programme.title: Brotherhood
programme.desc: Liu serves his triad society loyally and tries to live a respectable life, but over time his good intentions lead him to an all-out gang war with a startling conclusion.

programme.title: Shaolin Rescuers
programme.desc: Hong Xi Guan of Shaolin is chased and wounded by a martial arts scum who took refuge in the Qing court. He is saved and healed by friends from the wet market and they hide Hong in a bean curd shop to protect him. However, Hongs enemy finds him and ambushes him at the shop, hoping to capture Hong and all his friends.

programme.title: The Golden Knight
programme.desc: The heroine Yu Fei Xia is accused of stealing the book of martial arts secrets. To prove her innocence, she disguises herself as a man and finds her way into the Shaolin Temple to find out the truth

programme.title: The Cave of Silken Web
programme.desc: In this third instalment of Shaw Brothers Journey to the West, Monk Tang San Zang is trapped by seven seductive spider spirits who are hell-bent on achieving immortality by eating him! Monkey, Pigsy and Sha Wu Jing have to fight the spider spirits to rescue Monk Tang San Zang.

programme.title: The Kid With A Tattoo
programme.desc: Young Bao Tong witnesses the brutal murder of his kung fu master by a vicious villain. A large eagle tattoo on Baos chest was spotted by the killer as he escapes. Can Bao escape from the killer?

programme.title: Lady General Hua Mu-Lan
programme.desc: Mulan disguises herself as a male soldier to replace her aged father in a war against the barbarians. Her courage brings her victory in battles and she was promoted to a general. When Mulan returns home with glory, the chief commander asks her to marry his daughter, forcing Mulan to reveal her true identity.

programme.title: Lady Of The Law
programme.desc: Chan, the chief of Wan Sheng Escort, is forced to raise his opponents son, Yim. While Chan forbids Yim to practice martial arts, Yim secretly learns it. Ten years later, a rapist appears and Yim is arrested by a lady constable as the suspect. The rapist turns out to be Chans elder son and Yim is framed by the Chans. Can Yim prove his innocence?

programme.title: The Dancing Millionairess
programme.desc: Peter was a key dancer in a dance troupe and applied to be the chauffeur of a rich girl, Betty. When he is rumoured to be her lover, Betty is furious and goes undercover as a reporter to investigate the rumour. They fall in love in the process, and after putting Peter through many tests, they finally seal their love with a dance.

programme.title: Shaolin Abbot
programme.desc: Monk Chi San is sent by his Shaolin Master to learn a special kung fu from a Wu Dang priest. He gets embroiled in the fight between the Qing and Ming camps and has to gather disciples to rebuild the burnt Shaolin temple at the same time.

programme.title: House of Traps
programme.desc: An evil prince has hidden the stolen imperial treasures in a house filled with booby-trapped blades. Amid plasma-spurting attacks, heroes and rogues try to uncover the deadly secrets of the house...

programme.title: My Name Ain't Suzie
programme.desc: Young Mei Li works as a bar girl in Wanchai to make a living. When she meets Jimmy in the bar, she thinks he is her true love and falls crazily in love with him. When Jimmy has to leave, Mei Li is devastated. It is not until she encounters the triad boss Ying that she finally found someone to count on.

programme.title: Little Dragon Maiden
programme.desc: With Hong Kong cinema's new wave, high flying, martial arts action of the 1980's, came a new wave of actors; teeny-bopper, canto-pop singer/stars with little or no martial arts background. However, when a film like LITTLE DRAGON MAIDEN intelligently mixes the old with the new, the results are pure golden magic. This costume-action, drama, love story features relative newcomer Leslie Cheung, who falls in love with the Dragon Maiden while learning the art of swordplay. The recipe is complete when veteran kung-fu stars Chen Kuan-tai and Lo Lieh add just enough weapon-wielding spice to make this film really cook. Cheung garnered international recognition in John Woo's A BETTER TOMORROW and Ronny Yu's THE BRIDE WITH WHITE HAIR.

programme.title: Sons Of Good Earth
programme.desc: This is an epic tale set during the time of the Sino-Japanese war. A painter Yu saves a young girl, Lotus, who is being sold to a brothel. They fall in love, get married and settled in to a peaceful life. However, their life is soon shattered by the Japanese invasion and the brutal regime that follows.

programme.title: That Fiery Girl
programme.desc: The bandits of Hulu Valley slay the chief of the Mei Clan while searching for a treasure map. In retaliation, Chun from the Mei Clan infiltrates the bandit's fortress to map a way in for the authorities, but ends up falling in love with the bandit leader's daughter, Pearl. While Chuns plot is uncovered, he receives unexpected help from Pearl.

programme.title: The Story of Sue San
programme.desc: TIn this Huangmei Opera romance, Wang is the son of a respected government official whereas Sue San is a famous prostitute. Although they love each other and seem to be perfectly matched, the two are worlds apart when it comes to social ranking, which will prove hard to overcome...

programme.title: Holy Flame of the Martial World
programme.desc: This internationally popular tale of a brother and sister, seeking vengeance for the death of their parents through using the mythical yin/yang Holy Flame kung-fu technique. It's an outstanding epic choreographed and co-starring lead "Venom" Kuo Chue (aka. Philip Kwok).

programme.title: The Human Goddess
programme.desc: This is a love story between an alluring fairy, Seventh Sister, who comes down from heaven to experience life in 70s Hong Kong, and a man who is running a debt laden orphanage. A heartless tycoon plans to take over the orphanage for its land but has to deal with Seventh Sisters magical powers as she aims to protect it from falling into his hands!

programme.title: Mission: Impossible III
programme.desc: The next installment in the Mission Impossible franchise. Super-spy Ethan Hunt (Tom Cruise) has retired from active duty to train new IMF agents. But he is called back into action to confront the toughest villain he's ever faced - Owen Davian (Philip Seymour Hoffman), an international weapons and information provider with no remorse and no conscience. Hunt assembles his team - his old friend Luther Strickell (Ving Rhames), transportation expert Declan (Jonathan Rhys Meyers), background operative Zhen (Maggie Q), and fresh recruit Lindsey (Keri Russell) - to travel the globe pursuing Davian and rescue Hunt's love, Julia (Michelle Monaghan).

Hunt assembles his team - his old friend Luther Strickell (Ving Rhames), transportation expert Declan (Jonathan Rhys Meyers), background operative Zhen (Maggie Q), and fresh recruit Lindsey (Keri Russell) - to travel the globe pursuing Davian and rescue Hunt's love, Julia (Michelle Monaghan).

programme.title: Spider-Man 2
programme.desc: Peter Parker is confronted by multi-tentacled menace Dr. Otto Octavius and questions giving up his superhero life as Spider-Man to be with the woman he loves.

programme.title: The Sum Of All Fears
programme.desc: Based on Tom Clancy's novel "The Sum of All Fears", this espionage thriller tracks a sinister plot to draw the United States and Russia into World War III. When the Russian president suddenly dies, world tension escalates and young CIA analyst Jack Ryan must uncover who is behind the conspiracy.

programme.title: Race Across the World S4 Ep9
programme.desc: The five intrepid teams reunite in London to look back at their 51-day thrilling adventure through some of the most beautiful, populous and remote places on the planet.

programme.title: Life Below Zero S12 Ep3
programme.desc: School of Ice - Johnny tracks some caribou. Sue spots some ptarmigan, the state bird of Alaska. Ricko Dewilde teaches his daughter the native way of exploring.

programme.title: Sue Perkins Into Alaska S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Sue continues her Alaskan adventure of a lifetime, following the old gold trail route into the interior of America's largest and wildest state. She heads off the beaten track to explore the state's rich history and meet the incredible people who live in the Alaskan wilderness, to discover if she too could survive in its beautiful backcountry.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School S2 Ep2
programme.desc: Dillas Surprise - Crash a fruit-flinging party celebrating the return of Jelapat, Talaken, Bawan, and Rona to the nursery to join the rest of their classmates. Meanwhile, flooding overtakes the pre-release islands, and injuries stifle the progress of two students.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Chasing Freedom - Witness veterinarian Dr. Amanda Salb save an elephant calf caught in a poachers snare, racing time to treat the wound. Back at the base, an orphaned baby baboon meets his new family. A monitor lizard and duiker are returned to freedom in the wild.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Monkey Madness - Amanda puts a radio collar on one of the first cheetah cubs born in Malawi in twenty years and the team struggles to give a 4-meter python a physical. See a group of tourists deliver a rambunctious baby monkey they rescued from the pet trade.

programme.title: Wildlife ER S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Spiky And Stinky - Check out vet Phils clever tactics for handling prickly patients and marvel as RSPCA rescuer Chantel extracts a sooty possum duo from a chimney. Cheer on the clinics favourite survivor and see vet Meaghan unhook a curlew whos the catch of the day.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters S3 Ep1
programme.desc: Kimba's Rise - While the dominant males roam nearby territories, hunting duties fall to the Mwamba prides nine strong lionesses. See how they cope with the approach of the rainy season and six growing teenagers with boundless appetites.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters S3 Ep2
programme.desc: Prides and Prejudice - As the lionesses set out to recover the males who are needed to hunt buffalo, they must cross a crocodile-infested river. Follow Milo, the only cub in the mighty Mwamba pride, as hes saved from snapping jaws and cements the familys future.

programme.title: Super Shark Highway S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Food, Glorious Food - Embark on a dangerous tagging mission in South Australia that will show what sharks eat and why they gather in feeding hot spots. Then head north as a team chases tiger, bull, and hammerhead sharks and outfits one with a 360-degree dorsal camera.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Chasing Freedom - Witness veterinarian Dr. Amanda Salb save an elephant calf caught in a poachers snare, racing time to treat the wound. Back at the base, an orphaned baby baboon meets his new family. A monitor lizard and duiker are returned to freedom in the wild.

programme.title: Ireland's Wild Islands S1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Wilds of Winter - Endure winter and early spring on the west coast, where animals eke out a chilly existence. Watch red deer battle on windswept Inishvickillane, welcome seal pups amid howling storms on the Inishkea islands, and view the return of the basking sharks.

programme.title: Deep in the Heart S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Deep in the Heart - Take a journey through the eyes of catfish, ocelots, and other native creatures with narrator Matthew McConaughey. Celebrate the Lone Star States landscapes and wildlife, and learn how crucial conservation efforts can save Texas unique habitats.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters S3 Ep1
programme.desc: Kimba's Rise - While the dominant males roam nearby territories, hunting duties fall to the Mwamba prides nine strong lionesses. See how they cope with the approach of the rainy season and six growing teenagers with boundless appetites.

programme.title: Deep in the Heart S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Deep in the Heart - Take a journey through the eyes of catfish, ocelots, and other native creatures with narrator Matthew McConaughey. Celebrate the Lone Star States landscapes and wildlife, and learn how crucial conservation efforts can save Texas unique habitats.

programme.title: Super Shark Highway S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Food, Glorious Food - Embark on a dangerous tagging mission in South Australia that will show what sharks eat and why they gather in feeding hot spots. Then head north as a team chases tiger, bull, and hammerhead sharks and outfits one with a 360-degree dorsal camera.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School S2 Ep2
programme.desc: Dillas Surprise - Crash a fruit-flinging party celebrating the return of Jelapat, Talaken, Bawan, and Rona to the nursery to join the rest of their classmates. Meanwhile, flooding overtakes the pre-release islands, and injuries stifle the progress of two students.

programme.title: Battle Of The Alphas S2 Ep8
programme.desc: The Big Ones - Learn why bigger is definitely better for these alphas. Go ringside for a gorilla wrestling match, stay away from pushy moose antlers, steer clear of long pelican bills that snap at any enemy within range, and marvel at a megasharks stereo sniffer.

programme.title: Wild Castles S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Carcassonne - Travel to a centuries-old French fortress, home to some of history's greatest empires. Carcassone, once a centre of wealth and culture, is now a haven for wildlife. Birds, wild boar, and armies of insects endure in its bountiful surroundings.

programme.title: Secret Life of the Wombat S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Wombat Wood - In the cool highlands near Australias Snowy Mountains is Wombat Wood. There, dotted amongst the trees and dense foliage, are over a hundred wombat burrows. But when some of the burrows are flooded, the wombats need to find safety.

programme.title: Wildest New Zealand S1 Ep1
programme.desc: A Tale Of Two Penguins - Waddle into the world of the little blue penguin, the planets smallest penguin species, and follow two brave young males on their diverging routes to romance. See them learn crucial survival tactics, face enemies, and overcome danger, all for love.

programme.title: Wildest New Zealand S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Untamed West - Journey along a stunning strip of New Zealands West Coast that boasts rare ecological jewels, like alpine parrots and ancient eels. Discover its astonishing array of animals, which have developed cunning and resourceful ways to survive in the wild.

programme.title: Wildest New Zealand S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Wild Fortresses - Explore two New Zealand fortresses that protect vulnerable native creatures: a moat-protected island and a hilltop citadel surrounded by a predator-proof barrier. Examine the zones thriving species, which once dominated these remote islands.

programme.title: Wildest New Zealand S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Ocean Legacy - Welcome spring on the East Coast, where the native New Zealand fur seal and northern royal albatross return to find mates, breed, and raise their young. Learn how the strongest survive despite harsh terrain, volatile weather, and peckish predators.

programme.title: Wildest New Zealand S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Creepiest Crawlies - Brave the undergrowth and discover life on a different scale. Unveil New Zealands dazzling invertebrate population and examine the remarkable lives of flesh-eating centipedes, giant nocturnal crickets, fishing spiders, hungry glow-worms, and more.

programme.title: Reef Wrecks S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Mexico's Arificial Reefs - From opportunistic pirate ships to well-armed navy vessels, the Yucatan Peninsula is home to a variety of reef wrecks. With moray eels, schools of rays, and thousands of other creatures, these sunken ships have become vibrant marine habitats.

programme.title: Macro Worlds S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Winter Is Coming - Uncover the fascinating strategies insects use to survive through the coldest days of winter. In brilliant colour and slow motion, see ladybugs gather to stave off freezing and earwigs mercilessly defend their underground breeding chambers.

programme.title: Macro Worlds S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Meadow Of Horror - Enter a rarely seen world of insect terror, where brutal death, vicious fights, and last-minute rescues abound. In this ordinary setting, discover enemies and murderers, friendly encounters, and a little romance.

programme.title: Macro Worlds S1 Ep3
programme.desc: God's Darling: Beetles - Meet the most successful order of animals on the planet through close-up, slow-motion shots. Discover the hidden yet fascinating behaviour of domestic beetles, which have inhabited the earth for more than 240 million years.

programme.title: Super Shark Highway S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Food, Glorious Food - Embark on a dangerous tagging mission in South Australia that will show what sharks eat and why they gather in feeding hot spots. Then head north as a team chases tiger, bull, and hammerhead sharks and outfits one with a 360-degree dorsal camera.

programme.title: Island Of The Monsoon S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Web Of Life - A manmade lake in Minneriya National Park supports the largest concentration of elephants in Asia. Follow a young male who has reached a turning point toward adulthood. In the rainforest, jungles teem with a variety of bizarre species of insects.

programme.title: Island Of The Monsoon S1 Ep5
programme.desc: From Cloud to Coast - Monsoons sweep into Sri Lankas mountainous heartland, beginning a journey through the islands forests. Follow along from cloud forest to rainforest, mangrove to oceans edge. On this island the water cycle is creating special habitats for wildlife.

programme.title: Island Of The Monsoon S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Life On The Wing - Yala Park is an avian Eden, home to 215 bird species. Join them as they work to raise their young and find homes before the rains arrive. Discover a myriad of winged beauties from massive sea eagles to ornate flycatchers and tiny fantails.

programme.title: America's Wild Seasons S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Autumn - As fall sweeps across America and trees are set ablaze with colour, animals are faced with make-or-break decisions. Find out how bald eagles, beavers, and other creatures prepare for the colder, darker, and leaner months ahead.

programme.title: America's Wild Seasons S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Winter - Winter is the ultimate challenge for wildlife across America. Will they escape to milder southern climates or stay put and tough out the season? See how different creatures respond to the brutal cold and blizzards that blanket the North.

programme.title: The Great Elephant Tale S1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Great Elephant Tale - Follow the adventures of three elephants across three very distinct African habitats. Their travels combine to tell the story of how these emotional and intelligent creatures evolved over millions of years to survive on the continent.

programme.title: Island Of The Monsoon S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Web Of Life - A manmade lake in Minneriya National Park supports the largest concentration of elephants in Asia. Follow a young male who has reached a turning point toward adulthood. In the rainforest, jungles teem with a variety of bizarre species of insects.

programme.title: Island Of The Monsoon S1 Ep5
programme.desc: From Cloud to Coast - Monsoons sweep into Sri Lankas mountainous heartland, beginning a journey through the islands forests. Follow along from cloud forest to rainforest, mangrove to oceans edge. On this island the water cycle is creating special habitats for wildlife.

programme.title: Island Of The Monsoon S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Life On The Wing - Yala Park is an avian Eden, home to 215 bird species. Join them as they work to raise their young and find homes before the rains arrive. Discover a myriad of winged beauties from massive sea eagles to ornate flycatchers and tiny fantails.

programme.title: America's Wild Seasons S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Autumn - As fall sweeps across America and trees are set ablaze with colour, animals are faced with make-or-break decisions. Find out how bald eagles, beavers, and other creatures prepare for the colder, darker, and leaner months ahead.

programme.title: America's Wild Seasons S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Winter - Winter is the ultimate challenge for wildlife across America. Will they escape to milder southern climates or stay put and tough out the season? See how different creatures respond to the brutal cold and blizzards that blanket the North.

programme.title: The Great Elephant Tale S1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Great Elephant Tale - Follow the adventures of three elephants across three very distinct African habitats. Their travels combine to tell the story of how these emotional and intelligent creatures evolved over millions of years to survive on the continent.

programme.title: Wildest New Zealand S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Ocean Legacy - Welcome spring on the East Coast, where the native New Zealand fur seal and northern royal albatross return to find mates, breed, and raise their young. Learn how the strongest survive despite harsh terrain, volatile weather, and peckish predators.

programme.title: Wildest New Zealand S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Creepiest Crawlies - Brave the undergrowth and discover life on a different scale. Unveil New Zealands dazzling invertebrate population and examine the remarkable lives of flesh-eating centipedes, giant nocturnal crickets, fishing spiders, hungry glow-worms, and more.

programme.title: Battle Of The Alphas S2 Ep9
programme.desc: Power - Power up with alphas who use might to subdue enemies. Marvel when sea lions throw their weight around to win a mate, Cape buffalo deliver knockout punches, Canada geese hit hard with their wings, and lionesses rule the savannah with an iron paw.

programme.title: Wild Castles S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Predjama - Discover the world's largest castle carved into a cave. Predjama, in Slovenia, has provided protection not only for its Medieval human inhabitants, but also serves as a haven for the birds, boars, and mountain goats that live in the region.

programme.title: Secret Life of the Wombat S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Joey's Journey - Wombats are solitary, slow-moving creatures, but breeding time brings out their energy, aggression and lots of play. Meet a southern hairy-nosed wombat named Birri, whos trying to find a mate, along with a female named Winnie and her joey, Fred.

programme.title: Kenya Wildlife Diaries S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Haven Of Giants - Discover what staff at Lewa Conservancy are doing to restore damaged elephant ecosystems. See how monitoring elephant movements helps them understand these gentle giants needs, and if the creatures are returning to their natural corridors.

programme.title: Kenya Wildlife Diaries S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Ivory Wars - Witness Lewa's efforts to stop the illegal ivory trade, from building small armies and fending off poachers to educating local communities about the benefits of protecting elephants.

programme.title: Kenya Wildlife Diaries S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Horses Of The Sun - Grevys zebra populations are declining rapidly, putting the skittish animals on the endangered list. See what Lewa Conservancy is doing to protect the species, and how partner groups from around the world are lending their expertise to help.

programme.title: Kenya Wildlife Diaries S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Vanishing Wilderness - Uncover one of the biggest issues in African conservation: the growing human population. See how the battle for land creates unintended conflicts between humans and animals, and what Lewa staff do to cope in the short term.

programme.title: Kenya Wildlife Diaries S1 Ep5
programme.desc: A Place In The Wild - Kenya takes a major step towards creating the countrys first community-run rhino sanctuary. Find out why Lewa considers this the right move, and witness teams move rhinos from across the country to this new conservancy.

programme.title: Animal Empires S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Infestation - Ants, rats, and bats are uninvited guests. These animals use sheer numbers to claim a territory, and some are even considered pests. But their very survival may depend on finding a home where theyre not welcome.

programme.title: Animal Empires S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Sanctuary - For many species, strength in numbers and protecting the empire are imperative to survival. For these animals, protection means isolation and finding sanctuary from threats outside their boundaries.

programme.title: Animal Empires S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Migration - Epic flights, adventurous sea journeys, and exhausting road trips all play a key part in the lives of many species. But booking and organizing travel is no easy feat when those plans involve hundredseven thousandsof individuals.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School S2 Ep1
programme.desc: The Domino Effect - Witness some big changes when four cute new arrivals join the nursery classes. And for a handful of adolescent males that are growing too big and boisterous for their babysitters, its their last day at forest school.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School S2 Ep2
programme.desc: Dillas Surprise - Crash a fruit-flinging party celebrating the return of Jelapat, Talaken, Bawan, and Rona to the nursery to join the rest of their classmates. Meanwhile, flooding overtakes the pre-release islands, and injuries stifle the progress of two students.

programme.title: Life's Journey S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Life's Lessons - Young animals in Zambia face the great challenge of reaching maturity in order to breed, and every lesson learned could mean the difference between life and death. Coming of age for these creatures requires skill, strength, courage, and copious luck.

programme.title: Wildlife ER S3 Ep1
programme.desc: A Summer to Remember - Dive into a busy summer at the RSPCA Wildlife Hospital, where vet Emily takes the pressure off a gassy koala mum. Shadow the team as they fight a wave of lorikeet paralysis syndrome and see vet Karina use a teddy bear to rescue a flying fox pup.

programme.title: Wildlife ER S3 Ep2
programme.desc: A Prickly Problem - Join vets Emily and Martine in the OR, where Dolly the koalas spaying surgery takes a scary turn. Aid a run-over echidna with vet Nigel, see rescue officer Chantelles slick fix for a snared lizard, and probe a possible birdnapping with vet Karina.

programme.title: My Best Friend's an Animal S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Sammi, Rose and Casey - Roam across America with a road-tripping chicken and meet a mouse family living in an English garden. Beat arachnophobia with a spiders help, trek with the guardian of Earths last two northern white rhinos, and celebrate more interspecies pals.

programme.title: My Best Friend's an Animal S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Bandit, Max and George - Learn how cockatoos and platypuses inspired new careers, then explore the shared trauma that bonded a human and an elephant for life. Get playful with 35-year-old George the turkey vulture and say a moving farewell to human-raised kangaroos.

programme.title: My Best Friend's an Animal S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Spud, Digger and Tommy - Explore Tasmanian devils softer side, meet a pioneering sea turtle, and enjoy family dinner with Buttons the deer. Play football with 800-kilogram Spud the bull and learn how Digger the owl soothed conservationist Nigel during his cancer treatment.

programme.title: Life's Journey S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Life's Lessons - Young animals in Zambia face the great challenge of reaching maturity in order to breed, and every lesson learned could mean the difference between life and death. Coming of age for these creatures requires skill, strength, courage, and copious luck.

programme.title: Sort Your Life Out S2 Ep2
programme.desc: The Fall family's clutter has been spiralling out of control since they moved into their home four years ago. Stacey Solomon and her team help them get it under control.

programme.title: Amanda and Alan's Italian Job S2 Ep5
programme.desc: Amanda and Alan divide and conquer as they renovate the bathrooms. Amanda has big plans for converting one of the medieval tower rooms into a double-height sumptuous en-suite.

programme.title: Junior Bake Off S9 Ep15
programme.desc: The four remaining bakers face the most regal final in Junior Bake Off history: Coronation Day. In the Technical Challenge, the bakers take on Rav's Charlotte Royale.

programme.title: Go Dog Go! Ep29
programme.desc: Tail to the Chief / Chaser and Chewer: Part Chew - When Tag volunteers to be Mayor for the day, she promises everyone an ice cream party. But as she tries to do everything herself, the party plans begin to fall apart. Until Tag realizes that being a great Mayor means knowing when to ask for help. / Comic book villains Flea and Thunder (aka Frank and Beans) have teamed up with a Wicked Chicken to cause chicken-related havoc on Pawston. Heroes Chaser and Chewer (aka Tag and Scooch), team up with Flora Fedora (Lady Lydia) to save the town.

programme.title: Go Dog Go! Ep30
programme.desc: The Puppy Whisperer / Doggy Book of World Records - Tag becomes jealous when Yip prefers to spend time with puppy-sitter Beans instead of with her. Determined to win Yip back, Tag enlists the help of Cheddar Biscuit, Gilber, Spike and Frank to try and win him back. / Frank and Beans find out that Tag and Scooch are trying to get into the Doggy Book of World Records and sabotage every attempt. When Tag and Scooch find out what the sneaky duo are up to, they come up with a plan to outsmart them.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep37
programme.desc: Glamping / A Flower for Poppy - Branch is excited to take the Troll children camping with him. But when Guy Diamond arrives at the camp site with glamping gear, the kids decide they prefer Guys plush method of camping to Branchs insistence on roughing it./Poppys the most amazing gift-giver in Troll Village, and the Snack Pack are determined to finally gift her something as good as her birthday. So when Poppy off-handedly mentions her favorite rare flower, her friends set out to find it for her- but who will get to gift it?

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep38
programme.desc: The Partier's Apprentice / Hair Ball - Guy is running himself ragged trying to be the life of the party for every party in Troll Village. When Poppy suggests he train an apprentice, it seems like the solution to his problems! Until his apprentice starts to surpass his partying skills/When Smidge accidentally agrees to go with both Milton and Guy to the Trolls fanciest event, the Hair Ball, she must navigate the difficulties of her situation with help from her friends.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep37
programme.desc: Revenge Of The Prom - The gang joins King Julien at his Lemur School Reunion, but the party gets out of control when his old prom date, Karen, shows up for revenge.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep38
programme.desc: Eye Of The Clover - Clover wants to follow in her Grandma Rose's footsteps and compete at the dangerous Tournament of Doom, but King Julien forbids her to attend.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep9
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Strange Strife of the Smelly Socktopus - After Erica convinces them that being suspended is a great vacation, George and Harold pull off every prank they can think of in order to get suspended

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep10
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Flustering Mindless Woe of the Flushable Memory Wipes - After being made fun of for sitting in chocolate pudding, George and Harold go into hiding only to come back to find that everybody has forgotten who they are

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep19
programme.desc: Bees - Puss is terrified by an invasion by a swarm of bees, which only the hippy-like Piper can control with her magic flute.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep19
programme.desc: Stuff / Campout - When Kelp and Scallop discover Mr. Pearly has a cave full of stuff they help him to realize it could help a lot of other sea creatures. / When the group goes camping, Kelp helps Ollie learn that even though it didnt go exactly as planned, they can still have loads of fun.

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries Ep19
programme.desc: Missing Marcus / The Baby-Glitters Club - When Marcus leaves for sleep-away camp, Phoebe discovers that being a family fairy means helping everyone in your assigned family, not just the children. / When Tracy hires Cassie to babysit Nicholas, and Eden asks Athena and Phoebe to lend a helping hand, Cassie and the Dews must find a way to get Nicholas to bed without his missing and beloved penguin stuffy.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep19
programme.desc: Treasure Riders - When a swashbuckling adventurer named Waldondo comes to town, the Riders enthusiastically join him on a treasure hunt for a priceless gem.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep19
programme.desc: Tag Team / Cattitude Adjustment - With a new family moving to town, Mayor Sniffington wants Pawston to look perfect. Tag and Scooch offer to help, but it's too many chores to do on their own, so Tag builds a robot to help. But when Frank and Beans catch wind of the robot, they try to swipe it so that it will do their personal chores. \ When Tag learns that Pawston's new fire chief is a cat, she leads a welcoming effort with the dogs of Pawston. But when their attempts to welcome Tom and Kit Whiskerton go awry, Tag realizes it's because they're only doing things that dogs would enjoy.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep10
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Flustering Mindless Woe of the Flushable Memory Wipes - After being made fun of for sitting in chocolate pudding, George and Harold go into hiding only to come back to find that everybody has forgotten who they are

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep11
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Soggy Salvation of the Swirling Sweatnami - Tired of mean Mr. Krupp, the boys go back in time to prevent him from becoming a bully, but discover that their plan has backfired when they return to the present

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep12
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Sickening Fumes of Smartsy Fartsy - In order to retrieve Mr. Krupps locked up rule book, George and Harold use an invention that ends up turning against them

programme.title: Dragons: Riders of Berk Ep3
programme.desc: Animal House - As an approaching storm threatens Berk, Hiccup must work fast to make peace between the food-providing farm animals and the dragons.

programme.title: Dragons: Riders of Berk Ep4
programme.desc: The Terrible Twos - When Hiccup adopts a baby dragon that appears orphaned, Toothless becomes jealous and the baby dragons bereaved mother threatens the village.

programme.title: Dragons: Riders of Berk Ep5
programme.desc: In Dragons We Trust - After the dragons of Berk are blamed for an outbreak of crime, Hiccup is determined to find out whats really going on before the dragons are exiled.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep77
programme.desc: The Unshakeable Bear - Boss scours Chicago to find his old co-worker nemesis Board Member Bradley, his key to cutting a deal with the Federal Agents for his freedom. However, he must lose the tail of Canadas most notorious fugitive tracker, a trained bear cub named Henri. Meanwhile, Tina is trapped at home with her paranoid grandma Yaya, forced to prove to her that shes not a criminal baby like the news is causing Yaya to believe.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep78
programme.desc: Ba-Ba Town - The Templetons hometown is overtaken by baby criminals, with Temp Baby Aubrey in charge. Boss has 48 hours to somehow restore them all to adulthood and turn them in, or face jail time himself. With Tina now acting like a dark angel of vengeance after feeling betrayed by Aubrey, Boss is forced to assemble a team from unlikely odd friends. Together, they launch a final mission to settle old scores and clear Boss Babys name.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep51
programme.desc: The Business Boss: Back in Baby - After the events of the Boss Baby 2 film, adult businessman Theodore Templeton is framed for embezzling from his company and forced to revert back to his old Boss Baby self and crash with his brother Tim. But to pull this off, he'll need to win over Tim's family into letting him stay, and convince Baby Corp to give him back his old job... which is currently held by his baby niece Tina.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep2
programme.desc: The Knights Code - Po and Blade's personalities clash as they track Klaus and Veruca and fight off some of Po's old foes. Blade gets to see Po's kung fu mastery, but doesn't agree to team up with him until she realizes that he accidentally holds the key to finding Klaus and Veruca: he has a piece of the WuGao Gauntlet. Meanwhile, Klaus and Veruca continue on their path of destruction while looking for the mysterious "Lotus".

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep3
programme.desc: The Lotus - Po's moral lines are blurred when he and Blade have to break an untrustworthy hedgehog monk (Zhen) out of jail to get more information on what Klaus and Veruca stole from the Lotus. They learn from Zhen that there are in fact three more weapons, and Po recognizes one of them from a comic book.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep4
programme.desc: The Legend of Master Long-Tooth - Po and Blade must convince a deceased comic book writer's son to give them information about an unreleased comic that may point them toward the next weapon: a whip of fire. However, after the events of 103 Po is now a wanted criminal, so the Emperor's Forbidden Company arrives and captures him. Torn between saving Po and the mission she's sworn to complete, Blade flees and abandons Po.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep10
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Flustering Mindless Woe of the Flushable Memory Wipes - After being made fun of for sitting in chocolate pudding, George and Harold go into hiding only to come back to find that everybody has forgotten who they are
