programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep37
programme.desc: The Day Mel Fell/Burns Ex Boo - Mel Shellman gets fired and crashes with the FAST crew, but he's so annoying they try to get him rehired; An old flame shows up, making Chet jealous.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep38
programme.desc: Tough As Snails/Conspiracy - Whiplash takes on the toughest creature around in a MMA-style fight; When the FAST crew is abducted, Skidmark and his conspiracy club get on the case.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep37
programme.desc: Shockarachnids - Dozer and Skya work together to find their way home after they are attacked by Shockarachnids, jumper-cable-like snakes with high-voltage bites

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep38
programme.desc: Scaretrux - Revvit and the Reptools are trapped by Scraptors and create a fake T-Truxto scare them away, only to then have Skrap-It attempt to steal it

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep37
programme.desc: Once Upon A Time in Denmark - When Odlulu uses the Fairytale Key to pull Hans Christian Andersens fairytale characters from an old storybook and into present day Copenhagen, the Wanderers must rely on their knowledge of these timeless stories to put these characters back where they belong.

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep38
programme.desc: Baa-Baa for Now, New Zealand - When Odlulu enters Fritz as a dog in a sheepherding competition, Fritz uses the Magnet Key to gently guide all the sheep. But when he loses control of the sheep and they spill into Auckland, the Wanderers must find a way to lead the flock back where they belong.

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries Ep20
programme.desc: Hammy in the House / To Go Lunch - When Eden finds an "injured" Hammy out of his cage and helps him recuperate in her own home, she finds it harder and harder to get her "new guest" to return to his own home. / When Marcus forgets his lunch at home, Phoebe and the Dews must find a way to deliver him his lunch during his class's field trip to the park, but when they lose his lunch they must work to create a new and nutritious alternative.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep20
programme.desc: Family Trip / Great Great Grandicorn - Kelp and Scallop help Dad discover the true meaning of family trips. / When the Great Great Grandicorn comes to visit, the kids learn that making mistakes is part of learning.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep9
programme.desc: Slow Boat to England - Po and Blade head to the docks to take Klaus and Veruca to England, and Po tries to have fun with her on their last day together. However, Klaus and Veruca break free and hold Po hostage; Blade shockingly gives up the location of the fire whip to save him.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep10
programme.desc: The Knight's Fall Part 1 - Po and Blade rush to warn the Emperor about the weasels, but he has Po arrested and Colin captures Blade, revealing that she was never a knight. Thrown in a cell, Po reunites with Rukhmini and Mr. Ping, and he copes with the truth about Blade as they break out. Po fights Klaus and Veruca but is outmatched. Blade defeats Colin and hurries to help Po but is too late.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep59
programme.desc: Birthday Blues - Missing his old life on his birthday, Boss tries to have a full-fledged grown-up celebration in Chicago, but Carol is the only one able to chauffeur and take care of him. The two battle at every stop of the birthday party tour, but when Boss's old work nemesis sets him up for an Federal Investigation Sting at an improv comedy show, Boss and Carol are forced to work together to escape the law.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep60
programme.desc: Sitting Ducks - Boss, Tina, JJ, Dez and Pip willfully get babysat by the Uncuddleables, planning to expose them as horrible sitters via secret, hidden cameras. But the plan is thrown for a loop when Tina's first night alone without her parents makes her fall for their sitter Mia as a "substitute mommy." Meanwhile, Nannycam uses the babysitting distraction to sneak into the Uncuddleables' secret garage hideout to gather intel with her own "B field team."

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep9
programme.desc: Boots - Jack Sprat steals enchanted boots from the Treasure House and triggers a dangerous Devil Wind that threatens to consume San Lorenzo's treasure.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep10
programme.desc: Sword - Dulcinea pulls a magical sword from a stone and becomes enchanted with heroic powers; Puss must help her learn how to control her newfound strength.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep9
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Strange Strife of the Smelly Socktopus - After Erica convinces them that being suspended is a great vacation, George and Harold pull off every prank they can think of in order to get suspended

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep10
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Flustering Mindless Woe of the Flushable Memory Wipes - After being made fun of for sitting in chocolate pudding, George and Harold go into hiding only to come back to find that everybody has forgotten who they are

programme.title: Dragons: Riders of Berk Ep9
programme.desc: Dragon Flower - After a visit from Trader Johan, the dragons fall mysteriously ill and Hiccup and his friends must save them.

programme.title: Dragons: Riders of Berk Ep10
programme.desc: Heather Report Part I - Hiccup and the gang befriend a beautiful stranger who has a dangerous secret.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep41
programme.desc: The Neverending Clover - After Clover is knocked unconscious, the entire kingdom plays along when she wakes up believing she's living in a make-believe storybook world

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep42
programme.desc: Who Arted? - King Julien is crazy with jealousy and throws out the kingdom's art after he is upstaged by Mort who is now the town's hottest new artist

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep43
programme.desc: That Sinking Feeling - When Masikura convinces King Julien that the island is sinking, Julien believes building an ark is the only way to save his people

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep44
programme.desc: The Jungle Rooster - When the Jungle Rooster keeps him up at night, Julien discovers that the Foosa have been farming chickens for food and risks his life to free them all

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep45
programme.desc: The Good Book - Julien hires Croc Ambassador, an etiquette expert, to teach the kingdom how to behave at a classy ball, but everyone is too uptight to party

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep46
programme.desc: The King And Mrs. Mort - When King Julien gets sick, Mort must attend the Best Kingdom of Madagascar Award ceremony and comes back to find a Queen has taken his place

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep47
programme.desc: King Julien: Superstar! - Julien, Clover, Mort and Maurice become music sensations overnight, but the band breaks up over Julien and Clover's non-stop fighting

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep48
programme.desc: The Panchurian Candidate - After Uncle King Julien turned Pancho into a deadly killer so he could take back his throne, King Julien must save the kingdom before it's too late

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep49
programme.desc: The Wrath Of Morticus Khan - King Julien clones himself but things take a turn for the worse when Morticus Khan, an evil warlord, unleashes an army of Mort clones on the kingdom

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep50
programme.desc: Koto, Plain And Tall - Julien is lost in the jungle and accidentally saves a Mountain Lemur named Koto who turns out to be the biggest threat the kingdom has ever faced

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep20
programme.desc: Squad - Just as Puss is training the orphans to protect San Lorenzo, El Moco storms into town and cat-naps the swashbuckling hero.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep20
programme.desc: Family Trip / Great Great Grandicorn - Kelp and Scallop help Dad discover the true meaning of family trips. / When the Great Great Grandicorn comes to visit, the kids learn that making mistakes is part of learning.

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries Ep20
programme.desc: Hammy in the House / To Go Lunch - When Eden finds an "injured" Hammy out of his cage and helps him recuperate in her own home, she finds it harder and harder to get her "new guest" to return to his own home. / When Marcus forgets his lunch at home, Phoebe and the Dews must find a way to deliver him his lunch during his class's field trip to the park, but when they lose his lunch they must work to create a new and nutritious alternative.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep20
programme.desc: Puff Enuf - The Riders find a Puffertail and train her to join the family. She struggles to learn but soon finds herself with a chance to make a big rescue.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep20
programme.desc: Hocus Pocus / Furricane - When Tag and Scooch get a once-in-a-lifetime chance to learn magic from Muttfield, Tag cannot wait to be the star of the end-of-class show. When Scooch outshines Tag with his natural gift for magic, Tag gets jealous and attempts a master level trick that goes awry. \ The dogs are shedding their winter coats and it's the day of the big Pawston Picnic. But when Spike alerts the Barkers that there's an incoming windstorm, it's up to Spike and Tag chase the storm while the Barkers try to convince the dogs of Pawston to go inside!

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep13
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Troublesome Treachery of the Thieving Toot Fairy - George and Harold race against Mr. Krupp to try to get him fired before they get expelled

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep14
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Tenuous Takedown of the Tyrannical Teachertrons - In the season opener, George and Harold have returned to school due to a technicality, but the school has been taken over by Melvin and a cyborg Melvin from the future! Their goal is to make the school extremely difficult by replacing all the teachers with Teachertron robots. Suffering under the new regime and without Mr. Krupp/Captain Underpants on hand to help, the boys hypnotize gym teacher Mr. Meaner and turn him into Sergeant Boxers to fight back.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep15
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Frantic Fury of the Fearsome Furculees - Tired of the Melvins ruling the school, the boys realize that they need Mr. Krupp to make the school at least bearable. Unfortunately, Krupp has run off to Ecuador to look for a fabled fountain. So the boys form the M.I.S.F.A.R.T.S. - Mega Incredible Search Force Adventure Rescue Team Squad - to travel to Ecuador and bring Krupp back, whether he wants it or not.

programme.title: Dragons: Riders of Berk Ep3
programme.desc: Animal House - As an approaching storm threatens Berk, Hiccup must work fast to make peace between the food-providing farm animals and the dragons.

programme.title: Dragons: Riders of Berk Ep4
programme.desc: The Terrible Twos - When Hiccup adopts a baby dragon that appears orphaned, Toothless becomes jealous and the baby dragons bereaved mother threatens the village.

programme.title: Dragons: Riders of Berk Ep5
programme.desc: In Dragons We Trust - After the dragons of Berk are blamed for an outbreak of crime, Hiccup is determined to find out whats really going on before the dragons are exiled.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep52
programme.desc: The Stroll - Tina and Boss adjust to co-boss responsibilities while on a mission to rescue the baby with the best hair in the world from a lice outbreak. With opposing leadership views, the two split the existing field team's focus and discover a new archenemy in Lumpy the Park Duck.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep53
programme.desc: Potty Mouth - After a baby says a swear word on live television (censored by child-friendly online filter Sheriff Potty Pardner), Boss becomes obsessed with proving that the baby was taught this filth by their new arch-nemesis, Lumpy the Park Duck. Meanwhile, Tina's search to find what that swear word means creates unintentional havoc for both Tabitha's research paper and for Baby Corp's online systems when Sheriff Potty Pardner gives them an "internet time out"

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib Ep54
programme.desc: Imaginary Friends - After Boss insults Tina's imaginary friend, he's forced into "Imaginary Friend Sensitivity Training" at Baby Corp. Boss makes up his own imaginary friend to get out of these meetings, but after Tina gets a whiff that he may be lying, he's forced to keep up the charade at work and at home.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep13
programme.desc: One Last Job - The team plans a heist in order to obtain the enchanted pendant that can lead them to the storm wheels. Elsewhere, Klaus and Veruca shipwreck on a mysterious island that is actually home to the mages, and also the Tianshang weapon helmet.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep14
programme.desc: Doom and Groom - Po and the team have one last attempt to get the pendant, but they will have to disrupt Jayesh's wedding, and contend with his guards, to do so. At the mage island, Klaus and Veruca get hold of the Tianshang helmet.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep15
programme.desc: The Pinging - Mr. Ping is possessed by the ghost of Master Mastodon, the ancient master sworn to protect the Tianshang storm wheels. After a ghostly sewer chase, Mastodon agrees to help our team to stop Klaus and Veruca. He reveals that their next step is to go across the sea to Central America.

programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Troublesome Treachery of the Thieving Toot Fairy - George and Harold race against Mr. Krupp to try to get him fired before they get expelled

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep39
programme.desc: Groundhog Stay/Gone Guys Gone - Skidmark and White Shadow try to stop spring from coming by keeping a groundhog in his hole; Smoove loses the power behind his effortless cool.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep40
programme.desc: Party Poopers/The League - The FAST crew's vacation is threatened by hard-partying toilet frogs. The Crew quits racing when they become obsessed with a fantasy racing league.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep39
programme.desc: Magnet Mountain - Revvithelps Ty unlock his ultimate power to rescue all their friends trapped inside a magnetized mountain by D-Structs, Splitter, Blayde and Pounde

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep40
programme.desc: Pteracopters - When Pteracopterscrash land in the Flatirons, Ty and crew must go behind enemy lines to save their fallen wingman from savage STEALTH SCRAPADACTYLS

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep39
programme.desc: Trolling Through Iceland - When Odlulu uses a Wake-A-Troll Key to get her kite down from a tree, she accidentally brings two mythical Icelandic creatures to life. Using their wits and some Icelandic troll knowledge, the Wanderers must find a way to turn these mischievous creatures back to rock.

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep40

programme.title: PAW Patrol S8 Ep808
programme.desc: Pups Save the Dizzy Dust Express / Pups Save the Treetop Trekkers - When the Dizzy Dust Express appears with no one aboard, the Paw Patrol must stop the runaway train and find the missing passengers. // Ms. Marjorie, Tilly Turbot, and Mayor Goodway get stranded in the treetops on their jungle zip-lining adventure.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S5 Ep521
programme.desc: Pups Save Ms. Marjorie's House - Mysterious holes are appearing all over Ms. Marjorie's yard.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S1 Ep109
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Drive-In Movie Theater / The Crew Finds A Rainbow Treasure - Mix and Motor's favorite TV star has a new movie playing in Builder Cove, if the pups can build place to watch it! // When Grandpa tells the pups about a secret buried treasure, they find out the key to finding this treasure is construction teamwork!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S3 Ep306
programme.desc: The Camping Holiday - Peppa and her family are on holiday in their trailer van. They decide to go to Duck Land, a special park where they can see the ducks in the river, and are surprised when they learn that their van can convert into a boat!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S3 Ep305
programme.desc: The Camper Van - Peppa and her family go on vacation in a special van. Peppa is surprised to find that at a push of a button the van converts into a mini-house for them to sleep in!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S3 Ep306
programme.desc: The Camping Holiday - Peppa and her family are on holiday in their trailer van. They decide to go to Duck Land, a special park where they can see the ducks in the river, and are surprised when they learn that their van can convert into a boat!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S3 Ep307
programme.desc: Compost - Peppa and George take a bin of vegetable peelings to Grandpa Pig's compost heap. Worms inside the bin turn the peelings into compost, which Granny and Grandpa use to help their plants grow.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep178
programme.desc: The Gift Box - The friends are having a gift exchange and Bubu ends up with a present from Christopher. When he mistakes the box itself for the actual gift, Christopher is convinced Bubu doesn't like his present.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep101
programme.desc: Strawberries - Anna and Froga are excited to make the best strawberry pie ever with the first strawberries of the season. Anna makes a plan to distract Christopher while they make the pie!

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S2 Ep203
programme.desc: Turon / Matzo Ball Soup - When the Stump receives a delivery of an unknown fruit, Detectives Chef and Olly must solve the mystery of what it is before they can cook it. // When the gang gets the sneezles, it's up to Olly to finish the matzo ball soup without an exact recipe.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S1 Ep101
programme.desc: Bread - Tiny Chef bakes bread but forgets to watch his rising dough and needs to think fast when the dough grows too big!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S5 Ep509
programme.desc: The Great Space Race - Blaze and AJ take off into space for a race that's out of this world! Along the way to Planet Victory, they meet friendly aliens, dodge asteroids, and face off against Crusher's space ship!

programme.title: Hamsters of Hamsterdale S1 Ep125
programme.desc: Popcorn Goes to Kindergarten / The New Face of Num-Nuggets - The hamsters must save Popcorn when he accidentally goes to kindergarten with Bernie. // Greg is chosen as the face of a new flavour of Num-Nuggets but can't stand the taste.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S10 Ep1024
programme.desc: Pups Save a Runaway Robo-Chicken Purse / Pups Save the Buggy Trekkers - Digi and Tal's inventions to help a busy Mayor Goodway go haywire. // Mayor Humdinger squeezes himself into the Trekkers' dune buggy race, while his cheating ways put the other racers in jeopardy.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S10 Ep1025
programme.desc: Pups Take in a Runaway Kitty / Pups Save the Cheese Goat - Rocky Kitty runs away to join the Paw Patrol, he becomes a hero when he helps rescue Humdinger and the kitties // When Digi and Tal confuse a request for goat cheese and create a goat out of cheese instead, they wind up the target of a hungry eagle.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S2 Ep203
programme.desc: Pups Save Jake - Jake and Chase go deep cave spelunking when Jake ends up getting his ankle stuck between some fallen rocks!

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S1 Ep103
programme.desc: The Crew Builds An Ice Cream Shop / The Crew Fixes A Squeak - When a windy day derails construction on an ice cream shop, Rubble, Mix, Wheeler, and Charger are on the chase. // There's a mysterious squeak in City Hall. Mayor Greatway asks Rubble and Charger to find and fix the squeak before her big speech!

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S1 Ep125
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Parking Garage / The Crew Builds A Campsite - The Crew helps with a parking problem when Caf Carl's ice cream machine brings lots of cars to Builder Cove. // When Rubble's fear of the dark derails the pup's Bark Yard campout, the Crew comes up with an idea to help him enjoy the starry night.

programme.title: DORA S2 Ep210
programme.desc: Too Many Swipers / Bateo's Home Run - Dora and Boots help Swiper re-join with his duplicates and make it to Grandma's picnic. / Dora and Boots help Bateo the Bat get to the baseball game in time to play.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S3 Ep310
programme.desc: Do or Diary - Chucks tries to learn everything he can about teen fishies to get closer to his stepsister, Maddie.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S3 Ep310
programme.desc: Ice Ice Vola - Vola trains to become an amazing hockey player in just one day.

programme.title: Sharkdog S1 Ep116
programme.desc: Return of the Nightwalker - Sharkdog and Mia team up in an unlikely pairing to stop Max from sleepwalking right into the ocean!

programme.title: Sharkdog S1 Ep117
programme.desc: Dennis Drones On - Max and Sharkdog try to make enough money to buy a drone for Olivia.

programme.title: Sharkdog S1 Ep118
programme.desc: Sharkdog Sitting - While Max is out Olivia babysits Sharkdog but she just can't keep him inside.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S3 Ep308
programme.desc: Richard Rabbit Comes to Play - Richard Rabbit comes to play with George, and Suzy Sheep comes to play with Peppa! The boys and girls don't want to play the same games, but they all like jumping up and down in muddy puddles.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S3 Ep309
programme.desc: Fun Run - Daddy Pig finds it hard work when he runs a race to raise money for the school roof, but it's easier to run when a wasp is chasing him!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S3 Ep310
programme.desc: Washing - Daddy Pig hangs his clean football shirt out to dry, but Peppa, George and Mummy splash it with mud. They put it in the wash, but Peppa puts her red dress in too which turns Daddy's shirt pink!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S3 Ep311
programme.desc: Polly's Boat Trip - Peppa and George go boating with Grandpa Pig and Polly Parrot, but later Grandpa Pig drops his mobile phone into the water.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S2 Ep206
programme.desc: Fruit Chews / Opera Cake - Henrys in a Snail Race! But Chef's fruit chews for Henry's mid-race snack are taking too long to set! // After learning Ruby is an amazing opera singer, Chef tries to bake a delicate Opera cake while Olly noisily builds a stage for a Stump concert.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S2 Ep213
programme.desc: Watch Out For Barbabright / If I Were A Billionaire - The twins visit Barbabright's room. // If I were a billionaire, what would I do to achieve my dreams?

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep101
programme.desc: The Barbapapa Tree / The Barbababies' birthday - Barbapapa and Barbamama return to the tree they were born under. It's in bad condition. They must rescue it quickly without disturbing the nearby animals. // It's the Barbababies's birthday. They all want to do something different with Barbapapa!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S7 Ep706
programme.desc: The Snowflake Games - It's a head-to-head showdown when Blaze and Crusher enter... The Snowflake Games! Who will win the most winter sports and receive the prized Snowflake Medal?

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S7 Ep707
programme.desc: The Flying Contest - AJ is entering in the Axle City Flying Contest. But when Crusher sends him and Blaze away, they must get back in time for AJ to build his super-cool flying invention!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S6 Ep611
programme.desc: Pups Save the Land Pirates / Pups Save the Birdwatching Turbots - Pirates Alex, Julia, Julius and Chick-ARR-letta, are sent sailing into the desert and got lost! It's up to the PAW Patrol to save these Land pirates. // Cap'n Turbot and Francois chirp for help when a bird-watching contest leaves them up in the air.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S6 Ep613
programme.desc: Pups Save a Freaky Pup-Day / Pups Save a Runaway Mayor - Chase and Chickaletta switch bodies and must learn to work together to return Cap'n Turbot's boat to the bay. // Mayor Humdinger creates robotic Pants to cheat at the Most Amazing Athlete Contest. They go haywire so Pups have to save runaway Mayor.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S3 Ep310
programme.desc: Do or Diary - Chucks tries to learn everything he can about teen fishies to get closer to his stepsister, Maddie.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S3 Ep310
programme.desc: Ice Ice Vola - Vola trains to become an amazing hockey player in just one day.

programme.desc: Clock and Dance / Barbapileup - The barbababies prepare a show for Barbamama's birthday. While Barbalala finishes up, they go to the carnival where Barbabeau gets stuck in an attraction. // Three separate stories telescope into a big final bouquet in the middle of the courtyard.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S3 Ep306
programme.desc: Paddington and the Solar Eclipse/Paddington and the Mysterious Inventor - Paddington has a race against time in order to enjoy his first ever solar eclipse. // Paddington accepts an inventor's award for Simi when she's too shy to step up, but why does she then feel jealous and sad?

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S1 Ep112
programme.desc: The Crew Does A Home Renovation / The Crew Builds A Lighthouse - The pups are starstruck when their favorite TV renovation star, Hank Hammer, comes to see them at work. // Cap'n Turbot is bringing Mayor Greatway a big surprise. But when a thick fog rolls in, the pups have to build a lighthouse fast!

programme.title: DORA S2 Ep201
programme.desc: Big Big Boots / Backpack's Sticky Situation - Boots is too short to go on a ride, so he wishes to be bigger and becomes giant! Dora helps him go back to his normal size. // Backpack has something special for Dora, but she can't open! They travel to Abuela on Tallest Mountain so she can fix her.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S7 Ep708
programme.desc: Mission to Mars - NASA's Commander Megan is back! And she's taking Blaze and his friends to... Mars! But when Crusher accidently detaches the rocket ship's thrusters, it's up to Mars Rover Blaze to navigate Mars and get those thrusters back!

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S2 Ep209
programme.desc: Dino Cake / Dumplings - Olly wants to make a simple cake for her Dinosaur Club, but Chef insists on complicating the recipe. // Chef and Olly are making dumplings, but when first-timer Olly is better at making them, Chef must regain his confidence in his folding skills.

programme.title: Sharkdog S1 Ep102
programme.desc: Home Sweet Sharkdog - Max's new best friend, Sharkdog, comes home with him, but keeping him a secret from his parents is a challenge.

programme.title: Sharkdog S1 Ep103
programme.desc: Unfetch - When Sharkdog fetches items that belong to the residents of Foggy Springs, Max needs to help him return them all before anyone notices.

programme.title: Sharkdog S1 Ep104
programme.desc: Sharkdoghouse - Max needs to create a permanent home for Sharkdog and he knows that his best friends, Olivia and Royce, are just the people to help him.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S3 Ep310
programme.desc: Do or Diary - Chucks tries to learn everything he can about teen fishies to get closer to his stepsister, Maddie.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S3 Ep310
programme.desc: Ice Ice Vola - Vola trains to become an amazing hockey player in just one day.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep116
programme.desc: Shark Strength - When a game of coral pins bowling gets out of fin, Baby must learn to control his shark strength.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S8 Ep808
programme.desc: Pups Save the Dizzy Dust Express / Pups Save the Treetop Trekkers - When the Dizzy Dust Express appears with no one aboard, the Paw Patrol must stop the runaway train and find the missing passengers. // Ms. Marjorie, Tilly Turbot, and Mayor Goodway get stranded in the treetops on their jungle zip-lining adventure.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S5 Ep521
programme.desc: Pups Save Ms. Marjorie's House - Mysterious holes are appearing all over Ms. Marjorie's yard.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S1 Ep109
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Drive-In Movie Theater / The Crew Finds A Rainbow Treasure - Mix and Motor's favorite TV star has a new movie playing in Builder Cove, if the pups can build place to watch it! // When Grandpa tells the pups about a secret buried treasure, they find out the key to finding this treasure is construction teamwork!

programme.title: DORA S1 Ep111
programme.desc: Wonky Wishing Wand / Bip Bip's Big Show - Big Red Chicken's magic goes wonky and not only shrinks himself, but causes wacky things to happen throughout the rainforest. Dora has to fix it! // Bip Bip has a concert with Tico, but he's lost! Dora and Boots have to get him to the show on time.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S2 Ep201
programme.desc: Moving Mission / Barbabright's Invention - During a walk, the Barbapapa family discovers a megalith. // Barbabright has a stroke of genius: the invention of the "BAM".

programme.title: Hamsters of Hamsterdale S1 Ep122
programme.desc: Greg of the Wild / The Legend of the Library Hamster - The hamsters think a scout badge has magically turned Greg into a baby bear. // The hamsters meet a local urban legend- DeeDee, "The Library Hamster".

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S5 Ep510
programme.desc: Deep Sea Grand Prix - For the first time ever, Blaze and AJ are racing under the ocean! Blaze transforms into a submarine and speeds through sunken ships and coral reefs to reach the giant sand castle at the finish line!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S1 Ep109
programme.desc: The Jungle Horn - Stripes loves his jungle horn, a special instrument that can summon all the animals in the jungle. But when a jealous Crusher steals it, Blaze and Stripes must speed after him in a wild chase to get it back.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S10 Ep1003
programme.desc: Jungle Pups: Pups Find a Hidden Jungle - Tracker stumbles into a hidden jungle and its animal inhabitants who are frightened by the rumblings of an impending volcano. Its up to Ryder and the pups to use their new animal vehicles to rescue the creatures from the hot lava and save their home.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S10 Ep1006
programme.desc: Jungle Pups: Pups Save the Big, Big Animals - When the Hidden Jungle animals appear to be uncharacteristically frightened, Marshall discovers a saber-tooth tiger has been stalking them. And the big-fanged tiger is not the only creature strangely awakening from long, long ago.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S10 Ep1007
programme.desc: Jungle Pups: Pups Save the Meerkat Pirates / Jungle Pups: Pups Save a Hum-Hippo - Arrby recruits a crew of Meerkats to gather magical seeds. programme.title: PAW Patrol S10 Ep1008
programme.desc: Jungle Pups: Pups Save a Golden Sweetie / Jungle Pups: Pups Save the Giant Ants - The pups rescue Sweetie when she sneaks into the Hidden Jungle and finds a mysterious orb which causes everything she touches to turn to gold. // The Pups must save a colony of giant ants from destroying the Hidden Jungle and themselves.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S1 Ep113
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Dinosaur Museum - After uncovering dinosaur bones, the pups decide to build a dinosaur museum!

programme.title: DORA S2 Ep211
programme.desc: The Great Abuela Cookoff / Missing Map - After the Pokey Pigeons eat all of Abuela's elotes, Dora and Boots set out to find more ingredients for the Great Abuela Cook-off. / Dora, Boots and Backpack play an adventurous game of Hide-and-Seek to find Map.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S3 Ep302
programme.desc: Goldie's Fintuition / Raising Remy - When Goldie becomes a psychic, Baby and William set out to make her predictions come true. // Baby and William look after a baby reef rabbit and learn how difficult it is to be a parent.

programme.title: Sharkdog S1 Ep119
programme.desc: Fish Fiesta Freakout - Everyone's excited for the Foggy Springs carnival, but it's getting more and more difficult to keep Sharkdog a secret.

programme.desc: Sharkdog, Family - When the town discovers Sharkdog, Max needs to convince everyone that he's not a monster.

programme.title: Sharkdog S2 Ep201

programme.title: Peppa Pig S3 Ep318

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S2 Ep217
programme.desc: Finterstellar / Goldie's Greatest Role - Baby and Grandpa team up to win a bubble rocket competition. // Goldie puts on a play about a skatefish boarding legend and casts herself in the lead, instead of giving Vola a chance to shine.

programme.desc: Relay Tales / The Barbababies' World - Barbalib, Barbalala and Barbabelle take turns as narrators to tell a story, each one bringing a very personal touch to it. // The Barbapapa family spends a day at the beach. Divided into 2 teams, the barbababies fight over a sandy peninsula.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S3 Ep307
programme.desc: Paddington's Summer Holiday Begins / Paddington's Life Guard Training - The Browns are off to the beach for their holiday and meet Shantee the lighthouse keeper when they arrive. // Paddington, Jonathan and Judy become trainee lifeguards and end up rescuing Mr Brown with Taylor the lifeguard's help.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S1 Ep113
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Dinosaur Museum / The Crew Builds a Wheelchair Ramp - After uncovering dinosaur bones, the pups decide to build a dinosaur museum! // When Omar the Mail Carrier breaks his foot, it's up to the pups to make sure he can still deliver the mail by building ramps all over town.

programme.title: DORA S2 Ep202
programme.desc: A Piata For Mami / Invisi-Swiper - Dora's family makes a piata for Mami's birthday, but it flies away! They have to get it back safe before Mami arrives. / Swiper swipes an invisibility blanket! Now Invisi-Swiper is swiping everything, and it's up to Dora and Boots to stop him.

programme.desc: Best Fin-Ship Day - Baby Shark tries to give William the best Best Fin-ship Day ever.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S3 Ep313
programme.desc: Fire Engine - When Mummy Pig helps out at Miss Rabbit's fire station, she is called upon to douse the flames at Daddy Pig's out-of-control barbecue!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S3 Ep314
programme.desc: Princess Peppa - Granny and Grandpa Pig come for a dinner party with Mummy and Daddy Pig. Peppa and George are too tired to go to bed, until they are told a story.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep102
programme.desc: The Swing - When Anna and Froga discover the old seat of their swing, they are excited to hang it on the apple tree. But the ropes to attach it have gone missing!The two friends' search for the missing ropes turns out to be more difficult than they had imagined!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep103
programme.desc: The Detectives - Froga is desperate. Her favourite toy Super Pebble has disappeared! Now Anna and Ron work with Froga play detectives. Thanks to a thoughtful gift from Christopher, Froga ends up finding her missing Super stone herself!

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S2 Ep204
programme.desc: Peanut Butter & Jelly / Potato Skins - Chef tries to make the Stump Band the best peanut butter and jelly sandwiches during their Snack Break. // It's Potato Day, Henry's favorite holiday! Chef wants to whip up Henry's favorite potato dish - except Henry can't remember what it's called!

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S1 Ep102
programme.desc: Popcorn - Tiny Chef hosts movie night for friends and turns his tree stump into a popcorn machine to pop enough for everyone!

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep65

programme.desc: O - Dee encourages a friend to say 'o', and we go on an adventure around the sound. We meet an octopus and an orangutan, and see an ostrich in an office!

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep12

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep12
programme.desc: The Teamwork Badge - A big box is delivered to the Clubhouse and the Squirrels are very excited.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep11
programme.desc: The Pottery Badge - When Roly surprises Duggee, Duggee jumps and drops his cup, which shatters into pieces.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep10
programme.desc: The Honey Badge - Duggee's made some delicious pancakes, but the clubhouse is out of honey.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep23

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep31

programme.desc: Barky Boats - Bluey and Mackenzie are excited to spend time with their two buddies Mia and Captain; when the older kids run off to play together without them, Calypso explains that growing up can be hard.

programme.title: Andy's Global Adventures S1 Ep22

programme.desc: Caddisflies - Ranger Hamza and the Ramblers discover how caddisflies play such an important role in the environment.

programme.desc: Bowled Over - Sandy and Seaweed have invented a new game knocking down bottles with coconuts; they have called it 'Bowling'.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep6

programme.desc: Happy's First Day - Happy has always loved the water. But while swimming around in his paddling pool at the playhouse, Duggee reminds the Squirrels that there was a time when Happy feared water!

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep7
programme.desc: Avenue of the Baobabs, Madagascar - GrimHQ crashes into the Baobab trees. Can the Go Jetters rescue a baby lemur in time?

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep6
programme.desc: Machu Picchu, Peru - A giant grimbot bounces down the valley of Machu Picchu. Can the Go Jetters stop him?

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S24 Ep15
programme.desc: Gordon and Rebecca - Coming Through! - Gordon and Rebecca do the same work, but go about it differently, and when Rebecca tries to be more like Gordon, it doesn't go well.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S2 Ep18
programme.desc: Duck's Quack - Sarah suggests visiting the spare sounds section of the Big Shop when Duck loses his quack.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S2 Ep19
programme.desc: Rainbow's Niece - Sarah's new colour wheel reminds Rainbow that he has not seen his niece in a while.

programme.title: Nelly and Nora S1 Ep13
programme.desc: Frosted In - Nelly and Nora figure out how to walk around without slipping on icy patches.

programme.title: Dog Loves Books S1 Ep47
programme.desc: Dog Loves Questions and Answers - Pug starts asking Dog for the answers to life's big questions. They go on an adventure with Granny Pug who shows them that there are not always simple answers to difficult questions.

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep48
programme.desc: Hide and Seek - During a game of hide and seek, Monty wonders whether there is a way to hide other than in or behind something.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran S2 Ep7
programme.desc: It's Time to Open a Caf - After visiting the park caf, JoJo and Gran Gran decide to make their own play caf in Gran Gran's garden. JoJo learns that running your own caf is really fun.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep10
programme.desc: Chest - Dad tries to teach Bluey how to play chess, but Mum thinks she is still too young. When Bingo joins in, the kids make up their own rules, but they still can't beat Dad.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep11
programme.desc: Sheep Dog - Dad agrees to play Sheepdog with Bluey and Bingo to stop them from disturbing Mum who is taking a well-earned rest, but looking after a sheep is harder work than they expected.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep12
programme.desc: Housework - Mum and Dad vow to only finish their boring housework when the kids stop acting silly, but that's never going to happen, so they end up trying the same approach themselves.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep23
programme.desc: The Choir Badge - The Squirrels become enchanted when they hear a piece of music from Duggee's choir. They quickly learn what makes a choir.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep22
programme.desc: The Feelings Badge - The Squirrels notice that Happy isn't acting like his normal self, and he's strangely wearing new trainers. Happy doesn't know what he's feeling, and his friends want to help him.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep21
programme.desc: The Days of the Week Badge - After finding out that Mr Wobbly is visiting next Monday, the Squirrels impatiently want to know how long that means they need to wait.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep31
programme.desc: Timgad Ruins, Algeria - The Go Jetters visit Timgad in Algeria, but someone is playing games with their click-ons.

programme.title: Roots & Fruits S2 Ep11
programme.desc: Chilli Peppers - Live from the Roots and Fruits theatre, it's the bagpipe playing Chilli Peppers, melting Kiwi backstage and performing their song "We're Chilli When It's Hot!"

programme.title: Roots & Fruits S2 Ep10
programme.desc: Grapefruit - Live from the Roots and Fruits theatre, it's Grapefruit, dedicating the song "All My Friends" to the close pals who go with her everywhere.

programme.title: Supertato S1 Ep22
programme.desc: Carrot the Champion - A sporty Brussel Sprout, who's training Carrot to do the Ultimate Flip Kick, is Evil Pea in disguise. Evil Pea captures Supertato, but Carrot finally masters the flip kick and rescues him.

programme.title: Supertato S1 Ep23
programme.desc: Wonder Pea - Supertato is delighted when Evil Pea becomes his sidekick but it's all a trick and Evil Pea captures him! Evil Pea is forced to do a good deed because one of the Cobs needs help.

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep65
programme.desc: Honk Honk - The Teletubbies hear a 'honk honk' in the distance and the Tubby Car approaches. The Tubby Car drives the Teletubbies across Teletubbyland as they sing the Tubby Car song.

programme.title: Yakka Dee S7 Ep15
programme.desc: O - Dee encourages a friend to say 'o', and we go on an adventure around the sound. We meet an octopus and an orangutan, and see an ostrich in an office!

programme.title: Pop Paper City S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Sports Day - It's Pop Paper City Sports Day and Mae-Mae is the Sports Day judge, but can she decide on the right winner?

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO S1 Ep38
programme.desc: Me and My Shadow - When Messy breaks the lighthouse, things get shady. But without a shadow of a doubt, he and his friends save the day!

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep12
programme.desc: Housework - Mum and Dad vow to only finish their boring housework when the kids stop acting silly, but that's never going to happen, so they end up trying the same approach themselves.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep13
programme.desc: Pass the Parcel - Lucky's Dad is outraged that modern Pass the Parcel has a present in every layer and changes the rules back to only having one prize in the middle, but Bingo is forever losing.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep12
programme.desc: The Teamwork Badge - A big box is delivered to the Clubhouse and the Squirrels are very excited.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep11
programme.desc: The Pottery Badge - When Roly surprises Duggee, Duggee jumps and drops his cup, which shatters into pieces.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep10
programme.desc: The Honey Badge - Duggee's made some delicious pancakes, but the clubhouse is out of honey.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep24
programme.desc: Valley Of The Balls, Kazakhstan - Can the Go Jetters take control of a rocky situation in the Valley of Balls?

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep23
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Hurricane Rescue - Grandmaster Glitch tries to rescue a Grimbot from an Atlantic hurricane. The Go Jetters have to rescue him!

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep31
programme.desc: Burger Shop - It's time for Bluey and Bingo to get out of the bath. But Dad has decided not to tell them what to do and gets roped into a game of Burger Shop.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep30
programme.desc: Barky Boats - Bluey and Mackenzie are excited to spend time with their two buddies Mia and Captain; when the older kids run off to play together without them, Calypso explains that growing up can be hard.

programme.title: Andy's Global Adventures S1 Ep22

programme.title: Ranger Hamza's Eco Quest S1 Ep18

programme.desc: At UFC 280, lightweight champion Charles Oliveira faced the toughest test of his career in a bout against surging contender, Islam Makhachev. Relive their journey to the Octagon like youve never seen it before on UFC The Walk.

programme.title: UFC Connected Ep609
programme.desc: Ultimate Access: UFC 1 Fighters of the Roundtable, Battlegrounds: EnBo Fight Club, Fight of the Year: Weili vs Joanna, Inside the UFC: Fight Pass Invitational - Exclusive access to the 30-year reunion of the fighters from UFC 1. We meet the man behind China's iconic EnBo fight club. Zhang Weili and Joanna Jdrzejczyk look back at their historic fight in 2020. And a behind-the-scenes look at UFC Fight Pass Invitational.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC298VolkanovskivsTopuria
programme.desc: One of the most dominant champions in UFC history returns to face an undefeated contender, as Alexander Volkanovski travels from his home in Australia to defend his featherweight crown against Spains Ilia Topuria. Plus, former middleweight champ Robert Whittaker vs Paulo Costa, streaking bantamweight Merab Dvalishvili vs former double champion Henry Cejudo, and a whole lot more on UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 3 Ep6
programme.desc: Mencari Ramli adalah program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep11
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

Plus, former middleweight champ Robert Whittaker vs Paulo Costa, streaking bantamweight Merab Dvalishvili vs former double champion Henry Cejudo, and a whole lot more on UFC Reloaded.
